function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent cases of occlusions, overlaps, and crowded zones in the dataset","Impact":"Decreased accuracy of object detection and model performance","Mitigation":"Use data augmentation techniques such as random cropping and flipping to increase model robustness to occlusions and overlaps","Technologies":"Data augmentation tools and techniques, such as random cropping and flipping","People":"Data scientists, machine learning engineers","Owner":"Data science team"},{"Description":"Unequal condition for speed and generalisability testing on the OTC dataset","Impact":"Inaccurate comparison of model performance and generalisability","Mitigation":"Ensure that the testing conditions for speed and generalisability are consistent across all models","Technologies":"Benchmarking tools and methods for performance evaluation","People":"Researchers, data scientists, machine learning engineers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Benchmarking tests and comparisons conducted on a single hardware and software platform","Impact":"Risk of hardware or software bias affecting the benchmarking results","Mitigation":"Conduct benchmarking tests on multiple hardware and software platforms to ensure unbiased results","Technologies":"Multiple hardware and software platforms for benchmarking","People":"Research team, data scientists, machine learning engineers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
